content:
Equilibrium Constants for Ion-Pair Binding of NaClO<sub>4</sub> and NaI to <bold>MC1</bold> and <bold>MC2</bold> (CD<sub>2</sub>Cl<sub>2</sub>:CD<sub>3</sub>CN = 4:1, 298 K)<xref rid="t1fn1"></xref> ion-pair receptor MC1 anion receptor MC2 ClO4 –, K anion (M–1) 50 ± 10 60 ± 40 Na+, K cation (M–1) 50 ± 30 NaClO4, βoverall (M–2) 1 000 000 ± 600 000 <10 000 cooperativity α 400 ± 250 I–, K anion (M–1) 80 ± 5 100 ± 10 Na+, K cation (M–1) 50 ± 30 NaI, βoverall (M–2) 5 000 000 ± 1 000 000 <8000 cooperativity α 1300 ± 600

Ion pairing was also included in the fits to the model: K ip (TBAClO4 = 250 ± 60 M–1, NaBPh4 = 2 ± 1 M–1, NaClO4 = 200 ± 50 M–1, TBAI = 80 ± 10 M–1, and NaI = 60 ± 10 M–1).

Fitting gives an upper limit for βoverall (MC2).
clean_text:
Table 1. Equilibrium Constants for Ion-Pair Binding of NaClO<sub>4</sub> and NaI to MC1 and MC2 (CD<sub>2</sub>Cl<sub>2</sub>:CD<sub>3</sub>CN = 4:1, 298 K)[^a][^b]

|                   | ion-pair receptor MC1 | anion receptor MC2[^2] |
|-------------------|-----------------------|-----------------------|
| ClO<sub>4</sub><sup>–</sup>, K<sub>anion</sub> (M<sup>–1</sup>) | 50 ± 10 | 60 ± 40 |
| Na<sup>+</sup>, K<sub>cation</sub> (M<sup>–1</sup>) | 50 ± 30 | |
| NaClO<sub>4</sub>, β<sub>overall</sub> (M<sup>–2</sup>) | 1,000,000 ± 600,000 | <10,000 |
| cooperativity α | 400 ± 250 | |
|                   |                       |                       |
| I<sup>–</sup>, K<sub>anion</sub> (M<sup>–1</sup>) | 80 ± 5 | 100 ± 10 |
| Na<sup>+</sup>, K<sub>cation</sub> (M<sup>–1</sup>) | 50 ± 30 | |
| NaI, β<sub>overall</sub> (M<sup>–2</sup>) | 5,000,000 ± 1,000,000 | <8000 |
| cooperativity α | 1300 ± 600 | |

[^a]: Ion pairing was also included in the fits to the model: K<sub>ip</sub> (TBAClO<sub>4</sub> = 250 ± 60 M<sup>–1</sup>, NaBPh<sub>4</sub> = 2 ± 1 M<sup>–1</sup>, NaClO<sub>4</sub> = 200 ± 50 M<sup>–1</sup>, TBAI = 80 ± 10 M<sup>–1</sup>, and NaI = 60 ± 10 M<sup>–1</sup>).
[^b]: Fitting gives an upper limit for β<sub>overall</sub> (MC2).

Calculated Binding Cooperativity, Δ<italic toggle="yes">E</italic> <sub>α</sub>, Conformational Allostery, Δ<italic toggle="yes">E</italic> <sub>allos</sub>, and Electrostatic Cooperativity, Δ<italic toggle="yes">E</italic> <sub>elec</sub>, All in kJ mol<sup>–1</sup>, and Charge Separation Distances within <bold>MC5</bold>·Ion-Pair Complexes, <italic toggle="yes">d</italic> <sub>complex</sub>, and Free Pairs, <italic toggle="yes">d</italic> <sub>free pair</sub>, in Å, in Gas and Solvent Phases ΔE α ΔE allos ΔE elec d complex d free pair ∑r ion Gas Phase NaCl –309 –40 –269 2.5 2.4 2.7 NaBr –302 –39 –263 2.7 2.5 2.8 NaI –292 –36 –256 2.9 2.7 3.1 CH2Cl2 Solvent NaCl –59 –17 –42 2.7 2.6 2.7 NaBr –55 –15 –40 2.8 2.8 2.8 NaI –49 –15 –34 3.1 3.0 3.1

∑r ion = r Na + r X (X = Cl, Br, I), where r Cl = 1.7 Å, r Br = 1.8 Å, r I = 2.1 Å, and r Na = 1.0 Å.

Table 3. Calculated Binding Cooperativity, ΔEα, Conformational Allostery, ΔEallos, and Electrostatic Cooperativity, ΔEelec, All in kJ mol–1, and Charge Separation Distances within MC5·Ion-Pair Complexes, dcomplex, and Free Pairs, dfree pair, in Å, in Gas and Solvent Phases

|                | ΔEα  | ΔEallos | ΔEelec | dcomplex | dfree pair | ∑rion[^a] |
|----------------|------|---------|--------|----------|------------|-----------|
| Gas Phase      |      |         |        |          |            |           |
| NaCl           | –309 | –40     | –269   | 2.5      | 2.4        | 2.7       |
| NaBr           | –302 | –39     | –263   | 2.7      | 2.5        | 2.8       |
| NaI            | –292 | –36     | –256   | 2.9      | 2.7        | 3.1       |
|                |      |         |        |          |            |           |
| CH2Cl2 Solvent |      |         |        |          |            |           |
| NaCl           | –59  | –17     | –42    | 2.7      | 2.6        | 2.7       |
| NaBr           | –55  | –15     | –40    | 2.8      | 2.8        | 2.8       |
| NaI            | –49  | –15     | –34    | 3.1      | 3.0        | 3.1       |

[^a]: ∑rion = rNa + rX (X = Cl, Br, I), where rCl = 1.7 Å, rBr = 1.8 Å, rI = 2.1 Å, and rNa = 1.0 Å.
